name: Tales of Orelia
description:
Tales of Orelia is a game created by Lazy Tank Studios, a group of 22 students based at Southampton Solent University. There were strict pre-requisites for a file size of 50kb which meant a lot of optimizing of code and art assets was required.

The game takes inspiration from Zelda, Pokemon and other retro titles and features Pixel art, Quests,  Dungeons and a large explorable world set over 4 unique biomes.

PC/Mac Control Scheme:

  • MOVE - W,A,S,D
  • ATTACK - LMB (Left Mouse Button)
  • OPEN INVENTORY - I
  • SELECT (PICK UP) - E
  • MENU (ALSO CLOSES INVENTORY) - P
